definition: trusted/intimate/(of the emperor) to visit/variant of 幸[xing4]
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

pinyin: jin1 qian2 bu4 neng2 mai3 lai2 xing4 fu2

sentences.english: A happy family is much more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 幸福家庭比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: He spent his golden years traveling to many parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他通过周游世界度过了晚年的幸福时光。

sentences.english: West Lake osmanthus lotus root starch, win set cake, double happiness, wonton dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 西湖桂花藕粉，定胜糕，幸福双，馄饨小笼。

sentences.english: Making dead wood more blessed than living lips.
sentences.chinese: 使枯木比活生生的双唇更为幸福。

sentences.english: One Wow to the good life.
sentences.chinese: 一个能让人过上幸福生活的令人惊奇的诀窍。

sentences.english: May the years ahead of you filled with love and joy.
sentences.chinese: 祝你们今后年年月月幸福相爱。

sentences.english: True happiness is of a retired nature, and enemy to pomp and noise.
sentences.chinese: 真正的幸福不显山露水，它摈弃浮华和喧嚣。

sentences.english: The town was quiet but remote, they felt very happ though.
sentences.chinese: 小城幽静而偏僻，他们感觉却很幸福。
幸福伴侣总是强调积极的一面。

sentences.english: I high-profile quit, right of your happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我高姿态的退出，玉成你们不要脸的幸福。

sentences.english: My elder sister, take care of yourself and master the direction of your eudemonia .
sentences.chinese: 师姐，你要把握好幸福的方向，照顾好自己。

sentences.english: To drown my heart in the tender pain and sweet happiness.
sentences.chinese: 让自己的心有了柔柔的疼痛和幸福的甜蜜。

sentences.english: Saddening. I hope he is able to live and one day find some happiness.
sentences.chinese: 悲伤，我希望他能活下来，有一天能找到一些幸福。

sentences.english: The fundamentality of happiness lies in the choice of lifestyles.
sentences.chinese: 而幸福问题的根本，乃在于生活方式的选择。

sentences.english: He took that as an auspice of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 他把那看作是幸福的征兆。

definition: to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
